author: AAA3A
name: Seen
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
short: A cog to check when a member/role/channel/category/user/guild was last active!
description: Have you ever wanted to check when a member/role/channel/category/user/guild was last active? Then this cog is for you!
end_user_data_statement: This cog records the time the user last participated and the message they acted on (sending a message, modifying a message in the cache, adding a reaction to a message in the cache and deleting a reaction to a message in the cache). The user can at any time issue the command `[p]seen ignoreme` to cause this cog to ignore all its next actions and delete the previously stored data.
